meanings.definition: To view or inspect in advance
meanings.sent1: I previewed the new movie before it came out.
meanings.sent2: She previewed the document to check for errors.
meanings.sent3: The detective previewed the crime scene for clues.
meanings.sent4: The teacher previewed the upcoming lesson to prepare.
meanings.sent5: He previewed the map before starting the journey.

meanings.definition: A showing of a film, play, or other form of entertainment before it is released or shown to the public
meanings.sent1: The previewed movie was only for special guests.
meanings.sent2: We attended the previewed of the new play last night.
meanings.sent3: The previewed event had exclusive access for VIPs.
meanings.sent4: The previewed screening received positive feedback.
meanings.sent5: I got tickets to the previewed of the upcoming concert.
